channel.title: Comments on: Clean Code and Project Failure (or Risk is not Boolean)
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: traingamer
item.dc:creator: traingamer
item.content:encoded:
“Ultimately the blame for failures, mediocrity, and opportunity costs lies with the person who decided it was acceptable to forgo processes designed to best mitigate complexity and position the project for success.”

Or the person who didn’t understand how to mitigate complexity or underestimated the complexity or…
